contentData.title: We sing together
contentData.text: We love God and we want to literally sing his praises.

contentData.title: We share news
contentData.text: A Christian community is like an extended family, with ages ranging from 0-100. We love each other are keen to hear what's been happening in each other's lives, as well as celebrate birthdays etc.
